dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Welcome back. Today we are looking at the latest search trends surrounding Selena Gomez as of May 2024.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: That is right. There is a lot of buzz regarding her appearance at the Cannes Film Festival for the movie Emilia Perez.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: People are also searching for reviews of that specific film to see how her performance was received by critics.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Beyond the film industry, there is significant interest in the financial side of her career, specifically the Rare Beauty valuation news.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: It is impressive how she balances business and acting. We are also seeing queries about Only Murders in the Building Season 4.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Fans are desperate for a release date. Plus, her personal life is in the spotlight with Benny Blanco relationship news surfacing.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: Finally, her ongoing mental health advocacy continues to be a major topic of discussion this month for many people.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: It is a busy time for her across film, television, business, and her personal life as well.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: A
dialogue_chunks.text: We will keep monitoring these specific search queries to see what official updates come out next for the star.

dialogue_chunks.speaker: B
dialogue_chunks.text: Stay tuned for more updates on Selena Gomez and her various projects today.
